dcterms:description: The tuSimple lane dataset is the only large scale dataset for testing deep learning methods on the lane detection task. It consists of 3626 training and 2782 testing images, recorded on 2-lane/3-lane/4-lane or more highway roads, at different daytimes. The annotations come in a json format, indicating the x-position of the lanes at a number of discretized y-positions.
dcterms:title: tuSimple lane dataset
